snippet: A favorable exchange rate, a shortage of available properties and a pleasant climate has driven up prices along Cape Town’s Atlantic coast.
abstract: International House Hunting column; four-bedroom house with retractable roof in Clifton, seaside suburb of Cape Town, South Africa, is listed at $4.03 million; information about market and tips for buying properties in Cape Town highlighted.
lead_paragraph: A favorable exchange rate, a shortage of available properties and a pleasant climate has driven up prices along Cape Town’s Atlantic coast.
